title: Large 2 Bedroom/2 Bathrooms w/ Fireplace & Washer/Dryer In-Unit
posting_body: ['Come tour one of the largest units in town!', 'Fully Remodeled Apartment with fireplace, separate dining area, and in-unit washer/dryer!', '3D Tour available of a similar unit: <URL>', '235 Arlington Rd, Redwood City', 'Located in a fantastic central location', 'One block away from Whipple Avenue.', 'Convenient access to Highway 101 & 280', 'Minutes away from Downtown Redwood City and Downtown San Carlos and train stations', 'Apartment Features include:', 'Large living room with recessed lighting', 'Gas fireplace', 'Sliding door that leads to private patio', 'Separate dinning area with ceiling fan', 'Full kitchen with updated cabinets', 'Gas stove with microwave above and dishwasher', 'Washer and Dryer in hallway closet', 'Full bathroom in hallway with vanity, sink, and shower', 'New carpet and ceiling fans in both bedrooms', 'Master bedroom has two closets and full bathroom', 'Sonic Internet service available up to 10 GB', 'Also Included:', 'Garbage, Water/Sewer', 'Secured building', 'Pool on site', 'Covered parking', 'Extra large storage locker', 'Small pets OK with additional deposit', '$4,200 per month / $2,100 deposit with good credit', 'Please contact', 'show contact info', 'for an appointment to view this unit']
